   274	        """
   275	        if key not in self.cache:

   405	async def merge_async_iterators(
   406	    *iterators: AsyncGenerator[T,
   407	                               None], ) -> AsyncGenerator[tuple[int, T], None]:
   408	    """Merge multiple asynchronous iterators into a single iterator.
   409	
   410	    This method handle the case where some iterators finish before others.
   411	    When it yields, it yields a tuple (i, item) where i is the index of the
   412	    iterator that yields the item.
   413	    """
   414	
   415	    loop = asyncio.get_running_loop()
   416	
   417	    awaits = {_next_task(pair[1], loop): pair for pair in enumerate(iterators)}
   418	    try:
   419	        while awaits:
   420	            done, _ = await asyncio.wait(awaits.keys(),
   421	                                         return_when=FIRST_COMPLETED)
   422	            for d in done:
   423	                pair = awaits.pop(d)
   424	                try:
   425	                    item = await d
   426	                    i, it = pair
   427	                    awaits[_next_task(it, loop)] = pair
   428	                    yield i, item
   429	                except StopAsyncIteration:
   430	                    pass
   431	    finally:
   432	        # Cancel any remaining iterators
   433	        for f, (_, it) in awaits.items():
   434	            with contextlib.suppress(BaseException):
   435	                f.cancel()
   436	                await it.aclose()

   409

   412	    iterator that yields the item.
   413	    """

   415	    loop = asyncio.get_running_loop()
